info.title: superhero-api

get.description: the /api/auth/github route should be accessed directly in the browser, not via AJAX.

post.description: Use an existing username in the database, and the password is always "secret"

400.description: Bad request. The username and password do not match.

500.description: Internal server error. An error occurred during the authentication process or during the login session creation.

200.description: Logs out the user and redirects to the homepage
